column1: #Text=Earth King says : " I do n't care how you do it , but I want you to squash those unruly peasants ! "
#Text=Kyoshi says : " I wo n't do it . "
#Text=Earth King says : " How dare you defy your King !
#Text=Are you ready to make a compromise ?
#Text=" Earth King says : " Yes ... " Kyoshi says : " I do n't like this revolution either .
#Text=But everyone in this Kingdom must have a voice if balance is to prevail over tyranny .
#Text=So I propose this - you will listen to the peasants ' grievances and I will protect you interests and Ba Sing Se 's cultural heritage .
